message.content:
cs.CY, cs.HC, cs.SI, cs.CSCW, cs.CL 

The paper discusses the design of Citizen Science platforms, which involves the interaction between scientists and volunteers. This falls under the category of Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC) and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI). The paper also discusses the motivation and participation of scientists and volunteers, which falls under the category of Computer-Supported Cooperative Work (cs.CSCW). The paper also discusses the importance of knowledge sharing, which falls under the category of Computation and Language (cs.CL). Finally, the paper proposes guidelines for designing these platforms, which falls under the category of Cybernetics (cs.CY).
